alert.note: Alert for Eastern Kiowa County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued January 08 at 8:39PM MST until January 09 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Ground blizzard conditions. Winds of 25 to 35 mph will continue through tonight. No additional heavy snow is expected but snow showers will be possible, especially along the Kansas border locations. * WHERE...Eastern Kiowa county, Bent county and Prowers county. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. Very strong winds could cause extensive tree damage.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Kiowa County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County
